metadata.name: Nomads
metadata.description:
At times I wonder if my feelings, hopes, fears, and dreams are the same as my previous generations. carpet-weaver women know how to illustrate these emotions by weaving and I express the same emotions in my paintings.
In this collection, I'm trying to create an illustration combined
with 2D and 3D spaces.
this work is inspired by The motifs in the Qashqai carpet.
